amendatorysection.catchline: Consumer reporting agency; mandatory removal of security freeze; conditions.
amendatorysection.para: A consumer reporting agency shall remove a security freeze within three business days after receiving a request for removal from the consumer who provides both of the following:
(1) Proper identification as specified in subdivision (2)(a) of section 8-2606; and
(2) The unique personal identification number or password referred to in subdivision (2)(b) of section 8-2606.
